evidence_example.title: Blink Demo
evidence_example.small_descr: Task0 and Task1 are actived by alarms. Every tasks swith on a led.
evidence_example.long_descr: In this demo 2 tasks are actived by alarms controlled by timer1. Task 0 put on the green led and Task 1 put on the red led of the board, while the timer1 ISR put on the orange led.
